Animated Lightning Mace/Flail (Men)
動態光雷狼牙棒／鏈錘（男用）
動態光雷狼牙棒／鏈錘（男用）
Animated Lightning Mace/Flail (Male)
kDesc
Fashioned within the frightening forge of fulminology. Electricity discharges from its head. [#Legal]
Forgée dans la noirceur des nuages. L'extrémité de la masse envoie des décharges électriques. [#Legal]
In der beängstigenden Schmiede des Donners geformt. Die Spitze stößt Elektrizität aus. [#Legal]
Modellata in una spaventosa forgia di fulmini. Fiamme erompono dalla sommità. [#Legal]
Creada dentro de la terrible forja tempestuosa. De su cabeza emanan descargas. [#Legal]
검은 구름 속에서 태어나고, 포효하는 정전기로 담금질한 무기입니다. 소름끼치는 전기의 힘이 느껴집니다. [#Legal]
Fashioned within the frightening forge of fulminology. Flames blaze from its head. [#Legal]
於雷電交加中成形，前端發出電擊。[#Legal]
於雷電交加中成形，前端發出電擊。[#Legal]
Fashioned within the frightening forge of fulminology. Electricity discharges from its head. [#Legal]
